questions.question: In which search problem, to find the shortest path, each city must be visited once only?

answers.a: Depth-first search traversal on a given map represented as a graph
answers.b: Finding the shortest path between a source and a destination

questions.question: What is the objective of the traveling salesman problem?

answers.a: To minimize the total distance traveled by the salesman
answers.b: To maximize the total distance traveled by the salesman
answers.c: To find the shortest route between two cities

questions.question: In the TSP problem of n cities, the time taken for traversing all cities, without having prior knowledge of the length of the minimum tour will be_______.
Which of the following algorithms is a heuristic for the traveling salesman problem?

answers.c: Cheapest path from root to goal node
answers.d: Estimated cost of cheapest path from root to goal node

questions.question: What is the time complexity of the Traveling Salesman algorithm?
